name: Totally Ordinary Dating Simulator (Chapter 1)
description:
Totally Ordinary Dating Simulator is a dating sim where nothing out of the abnormal happens.  Too many visual novels nowadays want to put some kind of "twist" on their game, but not this one. In T.O.D.S, you'll talk to normal woman, partake in nice wholesome dates such as long walks on the beach. While the game may only have its first chapter release,  I can assure you that NOTHING CRAZY WILL HAPPEN IN FUTURE CHAPTERS ON RELEASE, and you can see this for yourself by following my game development v-logs on my social medias, such as Tik Tok, Insta Gram, and You Tube; all of which are linked below.

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPZbUtD5n0bM_zPTpzGT89A

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/mcjamees/

TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@mcjamees
